collaboration.connected: You are viewing the live version of this page

subscription.cantAddKnowledge: You cannot add any more Wish-Knowledge in the free version. Upgrade to a Plus Membership for unlimited Wish-Knowledge.

page.isNotAChild: This page is already not a subpage

deleteProfile.onlyIf: You can only delete your profile if:
deleteProfile.condition1: the total of all public views is below 2000,
deleteProfile.condition2: and after that there are no pages or questions left that are not properly assigned somehow.
deleteProfile.notPossible: Unfortunately, it is not possible to delete your profile on your own. Therefore, please write us a short email at
deleteProfile.contactReason: so that we can secure your valuable knowledge and remove your profile for you.

wuwi.explanation: If selected, it is publicly visible which questions are in your Wish-Knowledge (except private questions). No answer statistics are displayed.

supportLogin.explanation: Caution: This is only necessary after consultation with the memoWikis team! If you activate support login, memoWikis staff can log into your user account to fix errors or assist you, without needing or seeing your password.

warnings.attention: Attention: image rights are a sensitive topic. Please only upload images that are in the public domain, that are under an appropriate licence or that you created yourself.
warnings.allowedFormats: Only the following formats are allowed: {formats}

wikimedia.info: Wikipedia/Wikimedia hosts millions of images that can be freely used. On Wikimedia Commons, you can specifically search for content.
wikimedia.tip: Tip: When you click on the desired image on Wikipedia or Wikimedia Commons, you get to the detail view. (For some maps, you must click on the "i" logo in the bottom right corner.) Just copy the URL of that page.
wikimedia.urlTooltip: For images from Wikipedia/Wikimedia, you can provide the detail page URL, the media viewer's image display URL, the image file URL, or the filename (including extension).

license.title: Copyright information:
license.info: We need copyright information for this image to ensure that content on memoWikis can be freely reused. memoWikis follows the Wikipedia principle.
license.isOwnWork: This image is my own work.
license.notOwnWork: This image is not my own work.
license.declaration: I, {name}, the copyright holder of this work, hereby irrevocably grant anyone the right to use it under the “Creative Commons” licence "Attribution 4.0 International" (CC BY 4.0) {licenseLink}.
license.useWikimedia: We kindly ask you to upload the image to Wikimedia and embed it that way.

tooltips.correctFirstTry: Answered correctly on the first attempt
tooltips.correctLaterTry: Answered correctly on the second or third attempt
